definition[0]: to look quickly at something, or to look at something from behind something else, especially something that you are not supposed to see
example[0]: Shut your eyes and donâ€™t peek!
example[1]: Carefully he peeked through the glass window in the door.
example[2]: Paula opened the box and peeked inside.
definition[1]: if something peeks from somewhere, you can just see a small amount of it
example[3]: The moon peeked out from behind the clouds.
